name: Musume Raiser Prototype
description:
IMPORTANT: Requires WebGL2 support. Not guaranteed to work on Apple products.

Schoolgirl model by watatita AKA micro_field

This is a prototype that is missing certain core game features. I have been working on this raising sim for about 3 months. If you check my profile, you will see that my previous project was a multi-year undertaking. I wanted to try something quicker for a change.

Please share what you would like this game to be in the future. Any ideas from this focus test will be carefully weighed. Thank you for contributing to the future of this project.
